name: Dishwasher
description: Finally, a game about washing dishes professionally!  Dishwasher is a unique take on the classic link puzzle game.  Wash dishes and earn rewards, to increase your best score!  Cute. comedic and fun for simple enjoyment for hours and hours!  Create long links to reveal power-ups and wash dishes more efficiently.  Better hurry, it's four hours before your shift ends!  You might make your boss mad if you don't get them done in a hurry!
